column1: Breaking! #NewYorkCity Launches #COVID19 Pet Hotline To Provide Support For Animals Of Residents Affected By The #Coronavirus The Pet Hotline operators can be reached at (877) 204-8821, from 8:00am to 8:00pm EST daily. READ MORE: https://worldanimalnews.com/breaking-new-york-city-launches-covid-19-pet-hotline-to-provide-support-for-animals-of-residents-affected-by-the-coronavirus/
